snippet: As Carmelo Anthony recently displayed against the Celtics, the Knicks have a history of foolish acts and fisticuffs when the moment has demanded calm.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column says New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony’s recent suspension is a reminder that the team's history is blemished with acts of foolishness and fisticuffs when the moment demanded calm.
lead_paragraph: As Carmelo Anthony recently displayed against the Celtics, the Knicks have a history of foolish acts and fisticuffs when the moment has demanded calm.

headline.seo: Knicks and Anthony Remain Vulnerable to Self-Sabotage
headline.main: Knicks and Anthony Remain Vulnerable to Self-Sabotage
headline.print_headline: Knicks and Anthony Remain Vulnerable To Self-Sabotage
